derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English gēa, gē, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch and German ja

entry.tran: （yes的过时用法，用于诗歌或宗教语言）是，对
entry.def: Yea is an old-fashioned, poetic, or religious word for 'yes'.

entry.tran: （用于口头表决或表示同意）对，是
entry.def: Yea is sometimes used to mean 'yes' when people are talking about voting for or agreeing to do something.
